options.args: The transports used to serve the container

tcpPort.doc: port used to serve json rpc over websocket.

port.doc: port used to serve through http or https

key.doc: certificate private key. Works in pair with `--cert`. If the certificate is not provided, the key is ignored.

cert.doc: certificate to be used to serve secured server. Works in pair with `--key`. If the key is not provided, the certificate is ignored.

socketName.doc: name of the unix-socket / windows named pipe. This option is used only in case when local is provided as an argument
